mapper.select: SELECT mw.mwishcateid, mw.mentorid, mw.mcateid, mc.mname as mcate_mname, m.userid as mentor_userid FROM mwishcate mw INNER JOIN mcate mc ON mc.mcateid = mw.mcateid INNER JOIN mentor m ON m.mentorid = mw.mentorid WHERE m.mentorid = #{mentorid}
mapper.update: UPDATE mwishcate SET mcateid=#{mcateid}, mentorid=#{mentorid} WHERE mwishcateid=#{mwishcateid}
